summary_detail.value: Swan Mountain Outfitters will continue to guide horseback rides out of their Lake McDonald corral, and Glacier Boat Company will continue to offer boat tours on Lake McDonald, with some schedule changes to accommodate concerns about localized poor air quality during mornings and evenings.Horseback rides will be offered with a shortened schedule, with no ride being offered at 7:45 am. Visitors can call Swan Mountain Outfitters at 406-387-4405 for reservation inquiries or changes.Boat tours at Lake McDonald will no longer be offered at 11:00 am and 7:00 pm. Ticket office hours will be 12:00 pm to 6:30 pm. Boat rental hours at Lake McDonald will be offered from 12:00 pm to 5:30 pm. For questions and reservations, contact Glacier Park Boat Company at 406-257-2426.

title: Horseback Rides and Boat Tours to Continue at Lake McDonald (Sprague Fire Wildfire)
